name: Titanium.UI.iOS.Animator
summary: Provides support for the built-in iOS dynamic animations

events.name: pause
events.summary: Fired when the animator paused its animations.

events.name: resume
events.summary: Fired when the animator resumes its animations.

methods.name: addBehavior
methods.summary: Adds a dynamic behavior to the animator.
methods.description:
Specify an instance of one of the following Titanium behavior proxies:

  • Titanium.UI.iOS.AnchorAttachmentBehavior
  • Titanium.UI.iOS.CollisionBehavior
  • Titanium.UI.iOS.DynamicItemBehavior
  • Titanium.UI.iOS.GravityBehavior
  • Titanium.UI.iOS.PushBehavior
  • Titanium.UI.iOS.SnapBehavior
  • Titanium.UI.iOS.ViewAttachmentBehavior

methods.name: removeBehavior
methods.summary: Removes the specified behavior from the animator.
methods.description:
Specifiy an instance of one of the following Titanium behavior proxies:

  • Titanium.UI.iOS.AnchorAttachmentBehavior
  • Titanium.UI.iOS.CollisionBehavior
  • Titanium.UI.iOS.DynamicItemBehavior
  • Titanium.UI.iOS.GravityBehavior
  • Titanium.UI.iOS.PushBehavior
  • Titanium.UI.iOS.SnapBehavior
  • Titanium.UI.iOS.ViewAttachmentBehavior

methods.name: updateItemUsingCurrentState
methods.summary: Updates the animator's state information with the current state of the specified item.
methods.description: When an item is first added to the animator, the animator reads the initial state of the item, then takes responsibility for updating it. If you actively make changes to the item's properties, such as changing its position or dimensions, use this method to update the item's new state.

parameters.name: item
parameters.summary: Item to update with new state information.

properties.name: referenceView
properties.summary: Titanium View object to initialize as the reference view for the animator.
properties.description: When adding behavior and dynamic items to the animator, the animator bases its coordindate system on the reference view.

properties.name: running
properties.summary: Returns true if the animator is running else false.
